languages.text: "Понимаю, Звездное Сиятельство! Как говорят наши вельможи, поспешишь — семь раз пытай, один раз казни".

traits.locale_text: "Понимаю, Ваше Сиятельство! Как говорят наши вельможи, поспешишь — слуг насмешишь. И они же говорят — семь раз пытай, один раз казни".

languages.text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
languages.original_text: "Понимаю, Звездное Сиятельство! Как говорят наши вельможи, поспешишь — семь раз пытай, один раз казни".

traits.locale_text: "I understand, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
"I understand, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
"I understand, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
"I understand, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
"I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."
"I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

languages.text: “我完全理解，来自上界的大人！就像我们贵族常说的那样，要对罪人施加十倍的苦刑，毕竟每个人只能砍一次头。”
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: “我完全理解，来自上界的大人！就像我们贵族常说的那样，要对罪人施加十倍的苦刑，毕竟每个人只能砍一次头。”

languages.text: «¡Lo entiendo, Excelencia Celestial! Como dicen nuestros nobles, “mide diez veces la tortura, pues solo se puede decapitar a un hombre una vez”».
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo entiendo, Excelencia Celestial! Como dicen nuestros nobles, “mide diez veces la tortura, pues solo se puede decapitar a un hombre una vez”».

languages.text: "Anlıyorum Semavi Efendimiz! Soylularımızın da dediği gibi işkencenin dozunu aşırıya kaçırmamalı, sonuçta insanın tek bir canı var."
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum Semavi Efendimiz! Soylularımızın da dediği gibi işkencenin dozunu aşırıya kaçırmamalı, sonuçta insanın tek bir canı var."

languages.text: 「わかりました。天の閣下！貴族の言うように、拷問を10回数えて、汝一度だけ首をはねることができる」
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: 「わかりました。天の閣下！貴族の言うように、拷問を10回数えて、汝一度だけ首をはねることができる」

languages.text: « Je comprends, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Un dicton de la noblesse dit : "mesure ton supplice dix fois" ; un homme, en revanche, ne peut être décapité qu'une fois. »
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, Votre Altesse Célestissime ! Un dicton de la noblesse dit : "mesure ton supplice dix fois" ; un homme, en revanche, ne peut être décapité qu'une fois. »

languages.text: "Ich verstehe, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Wie unsere Adeligen sagen: Mäßige deine Folter zehnmal, denn du kannst einen Man nur einmal köpfen."
languages.original_text: "I understand, Your Celestial Highness! As our nobles say, measure thy torture ten times; thou canst behead a man but once."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe, Eure himmlische Hoheit! Wie unsere Adeligen sagen: Mäßige deine Folter zehnmal, denn du kannst einen Man nur einmal köpfen."
